actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education and Workforce Training.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Higher Education and Workforce Training

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Labor to make grants to States, units of local government, and Indian tribes to carry out employment training programs.
short_title: New Jobs for America Act of 2011

summary.text: New Jobs for America Act of 2011 - Directs the Secretary of Labor, subject to the availability of appropriations, to make grants to state and local governments and Indian tribes to carry out employment training programs to aid unemployed individuals in securing employment in a new area of expertise, particularly in emerging markets and industries (such as green technologies).

titles.title: New Jobs for America Act of 2011
To authorize the Secretary of Labor to make grants to States, units of local government, and Indian tribes to carry out employment training programs.
